text: Bhai CS779 ne hi mera tera introduction karwaya(special thanks to Jinang and Vivek:)). Lekin jo experience raha vo bohot thrilling raha. From Dirac Delta deadlines of NLP to Horrible Midsem presentation to defending our position on leaderboard to defeating Duluth Grad by pulling a night out, it was one hell of a thrilling journey. Looking forward to more such interesting ML journeys:)
author: Sajal  Chaurasia
